patterns::​composition_leaf
IMP_T
patterns::​ .​composite
patterns::​ .​composition_leaf​#(type IMP_T=uvm_sequence_base)
patterns::​ .​composition_node

Base composite adapter class for leaf node classes.

Implements a common interface for leaf and composite sequence items to act as a single unit type and vary seamlessly.

The is_composite() and is_leaf() methods may be used to differentiate between leaf and composite item types.

Identification Interface

virtual function int uuid()

See patterns::composite::uuid().
